file_content.text: That smuggler was pretty slippery. Glad that's over.
Hey, you're back--and Tyresius is still alive. Guess you two are bonding, huh?
The name's Gault, remember? Gault Rennow. And yes, we're getting along famously.
Is that so?
So far, so good.
We'll see.
He is an infamous scoundrel.
I've turned over a new leaf--unless an infamous scoundrel is what you need, of course.
For once, he's telling the truth.
Actually, it is.
We'll see how long that lasts.
I'll probably shove him out the air lock tomorrow.
I'm thinking of killing him.
With or without a containment suit?
Hey, you're back! And... uh, is that who I think it is?
Gault Rennow, at your service. Your friend here has hired me at wages I couldn't possibly refuse.
Did I miss something? Are we giving up on the Great Hunt?
Absolutely not. In fact, your friend here just killed the notorious scoundrel Tyresius Lokai.
All right, what's going on here?
Tyresius Lokai is dead and I've got proof. That's all that matters.
We made a deal.
I hope you know what you're doing.
We're still in the Great Hunt, and our target on Tatooine is dead.
Don't worry, Mako.
Whatever you two worked out, I'm fine with it--as long as we're still in the Great Hunt.
That's all you need to know, got it?
I don't like your tone.
Loud and clear.
You're alright with the galaxy's most notorious outlaw roaming free on your ship?
I think you'll find Gault Rennow's criminal record is spotless. I'm no trouble at all.
He knows better than to cross me.
Got that right.
Yes, my days of crossing bounty hunters are quite over--unless you say otherwise, of course.
Feel free to keep an eye on him.
Watch him for me, Mako.
You can bet I will. I've got all sorts of surveillance gear on this ship, "Gault."
I promise to always turn so you only see my good side.
Watch yourself, "Gault"--or I'll drop you out the nearest air lock.
Better not be.
This hunt turned out a lot stranger than I expected.
Well, I guess that wraps up our current target list. Let's see what Crysta has for us next.
I've had enough of scorching heat and sand. What say we check out our next target?
Everything I heard about Tatooine turned out to be true. This place might actually be worse than Hutta.
I sure didn't see this coming. But I gotta admit, it's a pretty good offer.
We gotta hurry!
At least we finally know where Tyresius's ship's at. We better hurry before he can fix it!
Woohoo! Way to go! That Houk was huge!
Be careful in there! Don't let Borga bite your head off! He sounds like a monster!
If you win this fight, you'll impress the Lady. I mean, that's something at least.
The Lady of Pain sounds like a tough customer. I hope she likes you.
Veeboo was a total sellout. I'm glad you blasted him.
Careful about approaching that Rodian. Word is he's killer with a blaster.
I can't believe he got away! I hate stealth belts!
This sounds like Tyresius all right. That sneaky mynock! Hope we're not too late!
That traffic control droid better be useful.
One thing's for sure, killing Tyresius will boost your reputation.
Every little bit helps.
It can't hurt.
You kidding? Catching the galaxy's most wanted smuggler? Instant fame.
What my rep needs is a catchy name that scares people.
I need a nickname.
Ooh, that'd be neat! How about "the Collector"? Or "the Shadow Tracker"?
I'm sure you'll come up with something.
Keep working at it.
Just throwing out some ideas. Nothing's carved in plasteel.
Those aren't bad. Let me know if you think of some more.
I like them.
Don't worry, I got a million of 'em!
Is that really the best you got?
Or ridiculous.
Hey, those were just off the top of my head.
He was nothing special.
I guess everyone slows down eventually. Still... he had a great run.
Let's search the ship. There's bound to be something worth taking.
Tyresius went to the cockpit! Let's get him!
